formula: a(n, m) = 3*(3*(n-1)-m)*a(n-1, m)/n + m*a(n-1, m-1)/n, n >= m >= 1; a(n, m) := 0, n<m; a(n, 0) := 0; a(1, 1)=1.G.f. for m-th column: ((1-(1-9*x)^(1/3))/3)^m.a(n,m) = m/n * sum(k=0..n-m, binomial(k,n-m-k) * 3^k*(-1)^(n-m-k) * binomial(n+k-1,n-1)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 08 2011
